p: The Government is allocating funds and staff for the national Nohep programme for viral hepatitis. This strategy for elimination of HBV, HCV, and HEV has been drafted and is now in the final stage of approval. Advocacy programmes on viral hepatitis and validated training modules for training health-care personnel have been developed. More than 3000 physicians serving the Health Cadre of the Bangladesh Civil Service have already received training about hepatitis and its management strategies.
